title: LOL client being glitchy af
body: This keeps on happening , not sure what i can do to prevent this

replies.body: Watching this makes me think that you might be having a network problem that's having trouble maintaining a connection, so you can't grab assets like for hextech crafting.  To help rule out some possibilities with your connection, I would suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  The steps here should help tune up and configure your network to keep a solid connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
